title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count! These pencils are perfect for all your writing and drawing needs. Designed with elderly folks in mind, we've made sure to provide a clear and simple description of its features and characteristics.

- **Smooth Performance**: Our exclusive #2 graphite formula ensures a smooth and effortless writing experience.

- **Consistent Lines**: The thick graphite core creates consistent lines, making your writing neat and legible.

- **Premium Wood**: We source our wood from responsibly managed forests, so you can feel good about your purchase.

- **Golden Yellow Lacquered Finish**: With a beautiful golden yellow lacquered finish, these pencils are not only functional but also stylish.

- **Pre-Sharpened**: No need to worry about sharpening these pencils! They come pre-sharpened and ready to use.

- **Latex-Free Eraser**: Our latex-free eraser removes marks completely without smudging, ensuring clean and precise erasing.

- **PMA Certified Non-Toxic**: Rest assured, these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them safe for everyone to use.

- **Ticonderoga Brand**: Ticonderoga is a trusted brand with over 100 years of tradition. Our pencils are preferred by teachers for their high quality.

- **30 Count**: This pack includes 30 pencils, so you'll never run out of writing utensils.

Don't miss out on the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count. Get yours today and experience the quality and reliability that Ticonderoga is known for!

Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count! These pencils are perfect for all your writing and drawing needs. 

With their exclusive #2 graphite formula, these pencils deliver smooth performance every time. The thick graphite core ensures consistent lines, making your creations look their best. 

Not only are these pencils high-quality, but they are also responsibly sourced. The wood used to make them is harvested from responsibly managed forests, so you can feel good about your purchase. 

The golden yellow lacquered finish gives these pencils a classic look, and the matte coating adds a touch of elegance. Plus, they come pre-sharpened, so you can start using them right away.

The latex-free eraser is designed to remove marks completely without smudging. And with its signature green & gold ferrule, it adds a touch of style to your pencil. 

Safety is a top priority, which is why these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic. 

Ticonderoga is a trusted brand with over 100 years of tradition. They are preferred by teachers for their exceptional craftsmanship and performance. 

Don't miss out on these amazing pencils! Get your Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count today and experience the difference for yourself.

Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count! These pencils are specially designed to make writing and drawing a breeze for everyone, including our beloved elderly folks who may find it easier to use traditional tools.

With their exclusive #2 graphite formula, these pencils provide smooth and consistent performance, ensuring your lines are always precise. The thick graphite core allows for effortless writing and drawing, making it perfect for any task.

The wood used in these pencils is of premium quality, harvested from responsibly managed forests. Not only are you getting a superior product, but you're also contributing to the preservation of our environment.

The golden yellow lacquered finish gives these pencils a classic and elegant look, while the matte coating adds a touch of sophistication. Plus, with their pre-sharpened tips, you can start creating right away without any hassle.

But that's not all! These pencils come with latex-free erasers that remove marks completely without smudging. The signature green & gold ferrule adds a touch of style and ensures the eraser stays securely in place.

Rest assured, these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them safe for all users. They are trusted by teachers, who prefer their high-quality craftsmanship and have been doing so for over 100 years.

The Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count is part of the Dixon Ticonderoga family, which includes other renowned brands like Prang, Pacon, and Tru-Ray. This long-standing tradition of excellence ensures you're getting a product that is loved and trusted by professionals.

So why wait? Experience the joy of writing and drawing with the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils. Order your 30-count pack today and enjoy the timeless elegance and performance that only Ticonderoga can provide.
